name: ternus-borrower-profile
description: Secure digital portal for borrowers to manage loan applications and communicate with lending team

scripts.dev: concurrently --names "CLIENT,PYTHON,PRICING-BE,PRICING-FE" --prefix-colors "cyan,green,yellow,magenta" "npm run client:dev" "npm run python:dev" "npm run pricing:backend" "npm run pricing:frontend"
scripts.python:dev: cd python-server && source venv/bin/activate && python main.py
scripts.pricing:backend: cd pricing-engine/backend && source venv/bin/activate && uvicorn main:app --reload --port 5001
scripts.build: npm run client:build && npm run pricing:build
scripts.setup: npm run python:setup && npm run pricing:setup
scripts.python:setup: cd python-server && python3 -m venv venv && source venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.pricing:setup: cd pricing-engine/backend && python3 -m venv venv && source venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt && cd ../frontend && npm install

author: Ternus
